comment.body:
Really nice, like the idea. 
And the first ones are linked already, keep it up! 
I will share this, we need more of this good stuff.

> [thevideovault](#comment_1_1DfkDpkeDXGbHJ2ZT31DPvYr5xR59Jr8BA): I'll link more by request. It would take forever to go through and do them all in order.

Of course, do you prefer requests via zeromail, or right here in the comments?
